CNOVAPETRO.NS.summary: CIL Nova Petrochemicals Limited manufactures and sells yarns in India. The company offers partially oriented, micro-filament, draw twisted, texturized, and fully drawn yarns. It exports its products to Turkey, Spain, Italy, Germany, Peru, Tanzania, Brazil, Israel, France, Portugal, and the Middle East. The company was incorporated in 2003 and is based in Ahmedabad, India.

GTNIND.NS.summary: GTN Industries Limited manufactures and sells cotton yarn in India. The company offers medium, fine, and superfine combed yarn. It also exports its cotton yarn to Europe and Asian countries. The company was incorporated in 1962 and is based in Hyderabad, India.
